title: 我的世界一开光影就闪退还显示页面太小无法操作
author: mckldea
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mckldea 于 2020-8-23 09:40 编辑 

我一开光影就闪退日志里显示页面太小无法操作
配置是
cpu:i5-10500
显卡：1660super
16g

replies.author: SPngChina
replies.txt_content: 重装系统99%解决 换台电脑100%解决

replies.author: mckldea
replies.txt_content:
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x000000073a000000, 452984832, 0) failed; error='页面文件太小，无法完成操作。' (DOS error/errno=1455)
显示这个
